description.en: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ar: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.br: Um Urso Polar que segue seu mestre e coleta itens caídos
description.cns: 一只北极熊跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein süßer Eisbär der dir überall hin folgt und deine Gegenstände einsammelt.
description.fi: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fil: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fr: un ours polaire très mignon qui suit son maître et ramasse ses objets
description.id: Polar Bear yang mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang yang dijatuhkan
description.it: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.jp: ポーラベアーを召喚させ、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 아기 북극곰을 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.pl: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ru: Белый мишка, который послушно топает за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Un Oso Polar que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A Polar Bear that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.th: หมีขั้วโลกที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚北極熊寵物的道具
description.vi: Một con gấu Bắc Cực đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt các vật phẩm bị đánh rơi
